period.custom_help:
Send the period in one of the formats:
‚Ä¢ `YYYY-MM-DD YYYY-MM-DD`
‚Ä¢ `DD DD` ‚Äî days of the current month (if the first number is greater than the second, the start is in the previous month)
‚Ä¢ `DD` ‚Äî one day of the current month
Examples: `2025-11-01 2025-11-07`, `1 7`, `29 02`, `7`
